title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Civic Education Course for Strengthening Multicultural Competency: Knowledge, Attitudes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of multicultural societies and secondary education curriculum experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of multicultural society (e.g., cultural diversity, equality, inclusivity) with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate a positive change of over 20% in attitude surveys based on multicultural education experiences
Learners design three multicultural lesson strategies applicable to real educational settings and improve them through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
